traits.locale_text: When using {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g}, the Executioner's melee critical hits inflict (3 × STR bonus) levels of bleeding on their targets instead of (2 × STR bonus) levels.
When using Scourging Strikes, the Executioner's melee critical hits apply bleeding <u>(3 × STR bonus)</u> instead of bleeding <u>(2 × STR bonus)</u> to their targets.
When using Scourging Strikes, the Executioner's melee critical hits apply bleeding <u>(3 × STR bonus)</u> instead of bleeding <u>(2 × STR bonus)</u> to their targets.

languages.text: {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}痛打{/g}使用時、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}は、ターゲットに{uip|OldDamage|d2114b8eb84646d9a85d596d5b094e0c}レベルではなく、{uip|NewDamage|d2114b8eb84646d9a85d596d5b094e0c}レベルの{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}を与える。

languages.text: 当使用{g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}灾祸打击{/g}时，若{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}，则会对目标施加{uip|NewDamage|d2114b8eb84646d9a85d596d5b094e0c}级{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果，不再是{uip|OldDamage|d2114b8eb84646d9a85d596d5b094e0c}级。
languages.original_text: When using {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} inflict {uip|NewDamage|d2114b8eb84646d9a85d596d5b094e0c} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on their targets instead of {uip|OldDamage|d2114b8eb84646d9a85d596d5b094e0c} levels.

traits.locale_text: 当使用{g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}灾祸打击{/g}时，若{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}，则会对目标施加<u>（3×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>级{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果，不再是<u>（2×力量加值）</u>级。

languages.text: Setzt er {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Peitschende Hiebe{/g} ein, belegen die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}s im {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g} Ziele mit {uip|NewDamage|d2114b8eb84646d9a85d596d5b094e0c} Stufen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (anstelle von {uip|OldDamage|d2114b8eb84646d9a85d596d5b094e0c} Stufen).
languages.original_text: When using {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} inflict {uip|NewDamage|d2114b8eb84646d9a85d596d5b094e0c} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on their targets instead of {uip|OldDamage|d2114b8eb84646d9a85d596d5b094e0c} levels.

traits.locale_text: Setzt er {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Peitschende Hiebe{/g} ein, belegen die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}s im {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g} Ziele mit <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> Stufen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (anstelle von <u>(2 × STÄ-Bonus)</u> Stufen).

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coups critiques{/g} infligés en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} par l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} sous l'effet de {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Flagellation{/g} infligent {uip|NewDamage|d2114b8eb84646d9a85d596d5b094e0c} niveaux de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} aux cibles au lieu de {uip|OldDamage|d2114b8eb84646d9a85d596d5b094e0c}.

traits.locale_text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coups critiques{/g} infligés en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} par l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} sous l'effet de {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Flagellation{/g} infligent <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g} )</u> niveaux de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} aux cibles au lieu de <u>(2 × bonus de FOR)</u>.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} применяет {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Секущие удары{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критические попадания{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} накладывают на цели {uip|NewDamage|d2114b8eb84646d9a85d596d5b094e0c} уровней {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} (вместо {uip|OldDamage|d2114b8eb84646d9a85d596d5b094e0c}).
languages.original_text: When using {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Scourging Strikes{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} inflict <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> levels of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on their targets instead of <u>(2 × STR bonus)</u> levels.

traits.locale_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} применяет {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Секущие удары{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критические попадания{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} накладывают на цели <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g})</u> уровней {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} (вместо <u>(2 × бонус СИЛ)</u>).

Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} применяет {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Секущие удары{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критические попадания{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} накладывают на цели <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g})</u> уровней {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} (вместо <u>(2 × бонус СИЛ)</u>).

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat'ın{/g} {g|f:47f5b3809fba409b9d27611ef0a77cd3}Kırbaç Gibi Darbeler{/g} kullanırken yaptığı {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşları{/g}, hedefleri üzerinde {uip|OldDamage|d2114b8eb84646d9a85d596d5b094e0c} yerine {uip|NewDamage|d2114b8eb84646d9a85d596d5b094e0c} seviyesinde {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanamaya{/g} sebep olur.
